g.text: QRCode OR HTTP Redirect (302) with client_id, request_uri and discovery_uri
Open the Wallet Instance app, local authentication
POST Wallet Technical Capabilities to the discovery_uri endpoint
and the Wallet Instance is not revoked.
Check Holder Key Binding and Proof of Possession:
- using the public key bound in\n the Credential to verify the VP token.
Then Extract the disclosed attributes: \n Check if all the required data are available
QRCode JS: Check authentication state (HTTP request with cookie)
Authentication state given with HTTP codes, untill expired or successful
